sequence:
The Lucky Crane

<size=45>Chapter 5 - Today, I'm Your Chef!</size>

scripts.say: Welcome back, Commander! Want me to bring you your food soon?
... Huh? Didn't I tell you that I'd be making your food today, not Shoukaku? I can't keep asking her to make food for you forever, so I tried my own hand at it!
Just sit tight, I'll be back in a moment.
A short while later, Zuikaku returned with a tray of food.
Dinner's served! Chicken nuggets with onions, rice cooked in barley and miso soup with an egg, and lastly for dessert: coconut juice and a Royal Rations Banana!
All in all, it's like a road trip through Flavortown! Bon appetit!
The food itself certainly looked appetizing, but it was arranged rather casually on the tray. One could really tell Zuikaku prepared this meal.
It also looks like she hid some tempura next to the chicken nuggets. Maybe they were meant to be a surprise?
... Delicious, like always? Sweet! I mean, even without my sister's help, I can at least make some delicious food!
So it's even better than the Grey Ghost's cooking? Thanks, Commander!
I've heard Vestal is teaching her how to cook so that basically means she's no match for me!
*Giggle*♪ I beat the Grey Ghost today♪
